Name: Crush Them！
About the game: In the quiet and peaceful grassland, a group of uninvited guests suddenly came! They are ordered by Satan to raid the walls of God! You have been hired by the gods as a new warrior, sworn to live and die with the wall! Now, follow the will of God and crush them with your fingers! 【The pleasure of crushing】 Use your fingers to match your hand speed, tap the screen, and crush these monsters! 【Gorgeous match】 You can encounter dozens of skills, learn them to make you stronger and play more cool special effects! 【Tough leader】 In addition to crushing mobs, you have to fight against a variety of difficult enemies and smash their plots! 【Advancement of strength】 By collecting the chalices your strength is permanently enhanced! 【Difficulty of freedom】 You can choose the enemy's growth path, customize the difficulty of the game, and crush higher-level enemies!
